name: Cochee Clearing
description: The forest beyond Uragota is different, somehow. An eerie stillness eminates from within, only perturbed by the sound of leaves in the breeze. A large tree has fallen in the path, you'll need to cut it away to continue.
actions: Chop Birch Trees:Birch Logs:You start chopping.

name: Higashi Woods
description: Trees blanket the hilly terrain, as you make your way further into the woods you find ample supplies for building traps. Large stones and sturdy sticks lie along the path.
actions: Gather Stones:Large Stone:You look around for large stones.

unlockableAreas.buttonText: Continue into the Heart of the Forest

name: Deep Higashi Woods
description: As you continue along the path the forest grows dark and musty. There are piles of cheese lying along the path, some have transformed into mossy mounds, while others seem quite fresh. The road continues up a steep hill ahead.
actions: Get Some Cheese:Cheese:You start gathering from the least smelly piles of cheese.

name: Higashi Bridge
description: A small bridge provides the only way across a deep canyon. As you step across the flimsy bridge you can hear the sound of bones rattling beneath your feet. It would be wise to not stay on the bridge any longer than necessary.

name: East Higashi Woods
description: The woods begin to thin as you reach the other side of the bridge. Hemp grows wild here, enough to harvest however much you'd like. The trail continues southward up the mountains.
actions: Harvest Hemp:Hemp:You begin picking hemp plants.
Chop Mesquite Trees:Mesquite Logs:You start chopping.

name: Higashi Canyon Floor
description: The path slopes steeply downward until arriving at the floor of the canyon. It's quite dark, but you can see the light of a nearby fire. A short, heavily bearded man sits beside it warming his hands.
actions: Mine Silver Ore:Silver Ore:You begin mining silver ore.
